item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (419 points | 119 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (155 points | 64 comments)
3. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (33 points | 8 comments)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (211 points | 249 comments)
5. Will Supercapacitors Come to AI's Rescue? (15 points | 4 comments)
6. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (173 points | 56 comments)
7. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (818 points | 356 comments)
8. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (182 points | 128 comments)
9. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (137 points | 63 comments)
10. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (63 points | 25 comments)
11. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (40 points | 9 comments)
12. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (362 points | 337 comments)
13. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (103 points | 12 comments)
14. Show HN: Feedsmith — Fast parser & generator for RSS, Atom, OPML feed namespaces (22 points | 3 comments)
15. Sneakers (1992) – 4K makeover sourced from the original camera negative (325 points | 233 comments)
16. Curl: We still have not seen a single valid security report done with AI help (227 points | 111 comments)
17. Design and evaluation of a parrot-to-parrot video-calling system (2023) (117 points | 51 comments)
18. The Tragic Story Behind the Infamous '4 Children for Sale' Photograph (2023) (11 points | discuss)
19. Propositions as Types (2014) [pdf] (86 points | 44 comments)
20. The Inchtuthil Nail Hoard (53 points | 12 comments)
21. MTerrain: Optimized terrain system and editor for Godot (51 points | 4 comments)
22. GenAI-Accelerated TLA+ Challenge (15 points | 2 comments)
23. Show HN: Reverse Pac-Man (44 points | 32 comments)
24. Memory-safe sudo to become the default in Ubuntu (165 points | 171 comments)
25. Replacing Kubernetes with systemd (2024) (406 points | 297 comments)
26. Sea snail teeth top Kevlar, titanium as strongest material (2015) (109 points | 56 comments)
27. An appeal to Apple from Anukari (315 points | 151 comments)
28. Critical CSS (190 points | 77 comments)
29. Carolina Eyck, renowned superstar of the theremin (68 points | 54 comments)
30. RK3588 – Implementing a Vectorscope for processing video in real time (45 points | 6 comments)
